Keynote address: Designing the Future of Intelligent Health: From Innovation to Integration

Plenary talk

Key announcements

Day 1 closing remarks

Day 2 Opening remarks

Event dinner and awards ceremony

Foundation models in Healthcare - Building the Intelligent Core

Exploring how large-scale foundation models are transforming clinical decision support — laying the groundwork for intelligent healthcare systems.

Digital phenotyping - The New Frontier of Personalised Care

Leveraging behavioural, physiological, and digital biomarkers to enable real-time, personalized health insights and proactive care delivery.

AI for Healthy Ageing — Empowering Longevity and Quality of Life

Exploring how AI and digital health innovations can enable healthy ageing through early risk detection, personalised care pathways, cognitive and mobility support, and continuous monitoring — advancing longevity, independence, and quality of life for ageing populations.

Next Generation Systems for Care Coordination and Decision Support

This session highlights how agentic systems and AI-driven decision-support tools are improving care coordination and clinical workflows. It explores real examples of intelligent automation, data-guided decisions, and safer, more connected models of care.

Intelligent Devices & Connected Diagnostics — Bridging MedTech and AI for Next-Gen Care

Showcasing how sensor technologies, connected devices, and edge AI are transforming diagnostics and patient monitoring. The session highlights practical examples of AI-enabled MedTech innovations — from point-of-care diagnostics to continuous monitoring platforms — and explores challenges in validation, and scaling these solutions into clinical workflows.

Investing in the Future of Health AI

Healthcare Innovation Pitch Challenge

Early-stage startups and research teams present innovations in AI, MedTech, and digital health to investors and clinicians.

Masterclass in Healthcare AI
